preference.name: AWBIndexBomSubscribers
preference.preference_description: Defines a list of valid applications that can subscribe for product structure index (Index BOM). The preference values are the valid values that are allowed to be set on the Awb0BOMIndexAdminData::awb0Subscribers property. Applications, based on these valid values will then enable features for that particular product and configuration represented by the Awb0BOMIndexAdminData instance. For example if the "MMV" value is set as subscriber on Awb0BOMIndexAdminData instance which represents a product and configuration, the Visualization application would enable Massive Model Visualization for that particular product and configuration.
